Serious accident closes Mass Pike West in Auburn 6:33 AM

Package sent to Globe helps end mystery

The arrival last fall of one of the strangest packages mailed to The Boston Globe – a cardboard box containing human remains – kicked off the unraveling of a 37-year mystery as the Globe and State Police launched separate investigations to determine the identities of the dead and bring some measure of peace to the survivors.
